thread.title: Field hockey | Lady Monarchs fall at Villanova
thread.title_full: Field hockey | Lady Monarchs fall at Villanova | HamptonRoads.com | PilotOnline.com

author: The Virginian-Pilot
title: Field hockey | Lady Monarchs fall at Villanova
text:
PHILADELPHIA After a scoreless 48 minutes, Villanova scored twice within 10 minutes, then held on for a 2-1 Big East field hockey victory over No. 12 Old Dominion.
Francesca Bello beat diving Lady Monarchs keeper Kealsie Robles for a 1-0 advantage, then scored 9:27 later to pad the lead. ODU's Chrissy Horn scored off a penalty corner with 10 minutes to play to make it 2-1. The Lady Monarchs were awarded three penalty corners with no time left, but couldn't convert.
ODU (8-7, 1-3), which outshot the Wildcats 17-6, plays at Delaware at 1 p.m. Sunday.
